title: Weekend Blossom
content:
Vinayaka Chavithi Subhakankshalu!!
Wishing all my dear readers, visitors and friends a very happy Ganesh Chaturthi.


Ganesh Chaturthi Neivedyam prepared by Amma: Pulihora, Talimpu Sengalu (Guggulu), Atukula Payasam, Uppu Kudumulu and Undrallu

Its been a while since I have shared garden images with my dear readers. :)

Hibiscus bud

Mudda Mandaram
